info.title: Klaviyo API (Beta)
info.description: The Klaviyo REST API. Please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com for more details.

get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-04-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get a flow action from a flow with the given flow action ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `flows:read`

patch.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-04-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Update a flow action.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `flows:write`

get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-04-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get a flow message from a flow with the given flow message ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `flows:read`

> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get the form with the given ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `forms:read`

> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-04-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get all flow actions associated with the given flow ID. Returns a maximum of 50 flows per request, which can be paginated with cursor-based pagination.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `flows:read`

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2025-07-15.pre/reference/api-overview#filtering
Allowed field(s)/operator(s):
`id`: `any`
`action_type`: `any`, `equals`
`status`: `equals`
`created`: `equals`, `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`
`updated`: `equals`, `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`

get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-04-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get all flow messages associated with the given flow action ID. Returns a maximum of 50 flow message relationships per request, which can be paginated with cursor-based pagination.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `flows:read`

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2025-07-15.pre/reference/api-overview#filtering
Allowed field(s)/operator(s):
`id`: `any`
`name`: `contains`, `ends-with`, `equals`, `starts-with`
`created`: `equals`, `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`
`updated`: `equals`, `greater-or-equal`, `greater-than`, `less-or-equal`, `less-than`

get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-04-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get the flow action for a flow message with the given message ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `flows:read`

get.summary: Get Action ID for Flow Message
get.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-04-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Get the [relationship](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/reference/api_overview#relationships) for a flow message's flow action, given the flow ID.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `flows:read`

post.description:
> ðŸš§ This endpoint is in beta and subject to change. > > A beta revision header (2025-07-15.pre) is required to use our beta APIs. Klaviyo APIs in beta are not intended for use in production. See our [versioning and deprecation policy](https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/api_versioning_and_deprecation_policy) for more information. Create a new form.

*Rate limits*:
Burst: `3/s`
Steady: `60/m` **Scopes:** `forms:write`

trigger_type.description: Corresponds to the object which triggered the flow.

operator.description:
Operators for static date filters.

E.g. "before 2023-01-01"

Operators for static date range filters.

E.g. "between 2023-01-01 and 2023-02-01"

Operators for relative date filters.

e.g. "in the last 10 days"

Operators for relative date range filters.

e.g. "between 10 and 20 days ago"
Operators for numeric filters.

Operators for relative date filters.

e.g. "anniversary in the last 10 days"
Operators for alltime date filters.
Operators for string filters.
Operators for string-in-array filters.
Operators for existence filters.
Operators for list contains set filters.
Operators for list length filters.
Operators for list substring filters.
Operators for boolean filters.
Operators for calendar date filters.
Operators for anniversary date filters.

filter.description: Optional filter on a specific list of form ids
Optional filter on a specific subscribe page url
Optional filter on a specific list of API keys (using last 4 digits of the key)
Optional filter on a specific list of user email addresses who initiated the manual action
Optional filter on a specific list of user email addresses who initiated the manual action

unit.description: Units for profile postal code distance conditions.

operator.description: Operators for list contains filters.

dimension.description: Dimension for date profile predictive analytics conditions.
Dimensions for numeric profile predictive analytics conditions.

value.description: Values for profile predictive analytics gender conditions.

dimension.description: Dimension for string profile predictive analytics conditions.

operator.description: Operators for numeric range filters.
Possible operators for since flow start date.

on_open.description:
See PushLinkAction in app.

This is not a flow action, but the literal action that should be
taken when the push notification is tapped.

winner_metric.description:
The metric to use to determine the winner of the A/B test action.

Note that this is different from the metrics used as a flow trigger.

on_execution.description:
The enum for whether the action will add/remove from the list in the
List Update Action.

id.description: The real ID of an action.

temporary_id.description: A temporary ID to use only during a create operation. Existing actions should use the id field.

id.description: The ID of template

editor_type.description:
`editor_type` has a fixed set of values:
* SYSTEM_DRAGGABLE: indicates a drag-and-drop editor template
* SIMPLE: A rich text editor template
* CODE: A custom HTML template
* USER_DRAGGABLE: A hybrid template, using custom HTML in the drag-and-drop editor

html.description: The rendered HTML of the template

amp.description: The AMP version of the template. Requires AMP Email to be enabled to access in-app. Refer to the AMP Email setup guide at https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/docs/send_amp_emails_in_klaviyo

created.description: The date the template was created in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm)

updated.description: The date the template was updated in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm)

integration.description: Timeframes for the signup counter lookback.

timeframe.description: Timeframes for the signup counter lookback.

id.description: The ID of the form

ab_test.description: Whether the form has an A/B test configured.

created_at.description: The ISO8601 timestamp when the form was created.

updated_at.description: The ISO8601 timestamp when the form was last updated.

Klaviyo-API-Key.name: Authorization
Klaviyo-API-Key.description:
Private key authentication for /api/ endpoints is performed by setting the `Authorization` header to `Klaviyo-API-Key your-private-api-key`
For more information please visit https://developers.klaviyo.com/en/v2025-07-15.pre/reference/api-overview#authentication
